H0.text: Who is the current Wimbledon Ladies Singles champion. Ashleigh Barty

H1.text: Who is the current Wimbledon Ladies Singles champion. Naomi Osaka

H2.text: Who is the current Wimbledon Ladies Singles champion. Simona Halep

H3.text: Who is the current Wimbledon Ladies Singles champion. Kvitová

A4.text: won 11 WTA Tour‑level singles titles, including a major at the 2022 Wimbledon Championships

A5.text: She defeated No. 3 seeded Ons Jabeur in three sets to secure her first major title

A6.text: Barbora Krejčíková defeated Jasmine Paolini in the final, 6–2, 2–6, 6–4 to win the ladies' singles tennis title at the 2024 Wimbledon Championships.

A7.text: In 2023, the Ladies' Singles title was captured for the first time by an unseeded player, Markéta Vondroušová, who ranked 42 in the world.
